archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define Incident Management policies and procedures
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: ITSM-based incident management practices. Within the Incident Management process the organization leverages ITSM-based incident management practices in response to a Warning.Â Incident Management will identify necessary Response & Recovery actions that may be conducted by Business Continuity Mgmt. processes or within Operations/Assurance.

properties.value: Not used for this process element.
